QuestData.Title: A Heavy Helping Hand
QuestData.Description: Burrian gave us the coordinates of the Dark Iron base. They named it Moira's Reach.$b$bBut half way through buildin' it the base got infested with goren.$b$bIf you head south you should come to the structure. Just look for a big ol' cannon.$b$bWe will follow as soon as we get this bloody tank untangled.
QuestData.RewardText: Co... Commander? Well ain't you a sight for sore eyes?$b$bI didn't think anyone friendly was comin' for me.$b$bWe found an artifact that seemed pretty handy against the locals in the area but then those acid-mouthed roly polies showed up and started eatin' everything.$b$bHelp me up an' we can git to it.
